entry.title: More Twitter Files. Some conspiracies are actually true.
entry.summary:
More Twitter Files. Some conspiracies are actually true.
Alex Berenson: 1/ My first #TwitterFiles report: how @scottgottliebmd - a top Pfizer board member - used the same Twitter lobbyist as the White House to suppress debate on Covid vaccines, INCLUDING FROM A FELLOW HEAD OF @US_FDA! Thanks @elonmusk for opening these files. https://alexberenson.substack.com/p/from-the-twitter-files-pfizer-board

entry.title: RT Tesla: Watch live TV & stream your favorite shows in your Tesla when parked
entry.summary:
RT Tesla Watch live TV & stream your favorite shows in your Tesla when parked
D-Love: So this is cool - watching a live game in my Tesla while supercharging. ESPN via the Hulu app.

entry.title: Re @neontaster We will also be adding simple formatting features like bold, underline & font size later this quarter. The goal is to allow people to p...
entry.summary: Re @neontaster We will also be adding simple formatting features like bold, underline & font size later this quarter. The goal is to allow people to publish long-form natively on Twitter, rather than forcing them to use another website. Twitter will continue to recommend brevity in tweets.

entry.title: Re @neontaster Yes, these will get the same Timeline screen space as other tweets, but you will be able to click for more

entry.title: Easy swipe right/left to move between recommended vs followed tweets rolls out later this week. First part of a much larger UI overhaul. Bookmark butt...
entry.summary: Easy swipe right/left to move between recommended vs followed tweets rolls out later this week. First part of a much larger UI overhaul. Bookmark button (de facto silent like) on Tweet details rolls out a week later. Long form tweets early Feb.
